import React, { Component } from 'react' import {MdLocalShipping} from 'react-icons/md'; import {GrCreditCard} from 'react-icons/gr'; import CheckoutList from './CheckoutList.js'; import Title from '../Title'; import context from '../../contextAPI'; export default class Checkout extends Component { constructor(){ super(); let {cart,cartLoading} = context; this.state = { name: "", surname: "", address: "", num: null, city: "", state: "", email: "", cart, cartLoading } } componentDidMount(){ window.scrollTo(0,0); } handleChanges = event => { const target = event.target; const value = target.value; const name = target.name; this.setState({ [name] : value }) } render() { if(this.state.cartLoading) return if(thiscart.length === 0) return return ( <>
